summary: The Department of Veterans Affairs spent about $4 million last year to maintain hundreds of empty buildings. Federal management of real property (including VA's) has been on our High Risk List since 2003. We found VA has taken steps to improve how it gets rid of excess property. For example, it sought to streamline the process for reviewing historic buildings before demolishing, selling, or otherwise...
title: VA Real Property: Clear Procedures and Improved Data Collection Could Facilitate Property Disposals
